Pre-Game Insights: The defending champions, England, faced a disappointing loss at the hands of New Zealand in the opening encounter of the ODI World Cup 2023.
Bangladesh had a dream start to the competition, beating Afghanistan in their opening encounter courtesy of Mehidy Hasan Miraz and Nazmul Hossain Shanto's half-centuries.
The match between England and Bangladesh will be played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association (HPCA) Stadium in Dharamshala.
The game between England vs Bangladesh is scheduled to kickstart at 10:30 (IST) (+5:30 GMT).
Star Sports Network has acquired the rights to broadcast the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
The live streaming of the match between England and Bangladesh will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
According to Dafabet, the odds for this Cricket World Cup 2023 match are England at 1.21 and Bangladesh at 4.70.
